node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好， 2 月 19 日到印度，6 月 30 日乘搭埃塞俄比亞航空 ET5611 回港，抵港後入住駿洋邨檢疫中心，7 月 4 出現發燒及肚瀉症狀，由檢疫中心送院。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health, travelled to India on February 19, and returned to Hong Kong by flight ET5611 on June 30. He was transferred to Chun Yeung Estate quarantine centre upon return, developed fever and diarrhea on July 4, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre.
